Articles.Content:
![FLTgyrE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FLTgyrE.jpg)

Something like the tail ramp in the photo but only fitting with MK3 cargo bays. This would be very cool and it would help people with missions and deploying stuff.

Please let me know if something like this has been made!

-DMSP

You might look at SXT [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-N-1-and-Aero-update-SXT-20-15FEV15-KSC-v3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-N-1-and-Aero-update-SXT-20-15FEV15-KSC-v3) or FantomWorks [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack).

That is B9 HL, and conveniently ....

![83jCxk6.png](http://i.imgur.com/83jCxk6.png)

stock Mk3 was developed from B9 HL!. So yes, something exactly like that has been made.
